reasoning: To retrieve the cards from the set 'OGW', we need to join the 'cards' table with the 'sets' table using the 'code' to filter the cards.
The 'name' column is required to display the names of the cards from the set 'OGW'.
The 'colors' column is necessary to state the color of the cards from the set 'OGW'.
The 'code' column from the 'sets' table is used to identify the cards that belong to the set 'OGW'.
The 'id' column from the 'sets' table is needed to establish the join with the 'cards' table.
